title: Log in is blocked

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: as you can see log in is blocked and im clearly online  , not sure if this should be posted to help or as a bug but oh well .

replies.body: We started having another round of login issues around 9PM PST last night. We're still working on getting everything back up and running, and you can always stay updated by checking the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw).
